page.title: 01GENERAL INTRODUCTION
page.content: The area is situated about 5km.South East of Stafford. It is a rural area containing farmland,parkland and the villages of Milford,Tixall and part of Great Haywood. At Milford is Shugborough Park, the ancestral home of Lord Lichfield and Milford Common leading into Cannock Chase.Two canals,the Staffordshire & Worcestershire and the Trent & Mersey, meet at Great Haywood Junction, all of which bring Tourists to the area. The following pages describe the Hall Museum and Farm at Shugborough. Lord Lichfield. The farms-Brancote;Kennels; Holme.The Youth Year Festival. Tixall, Milford and Great Haywood villages. Family Life-girl and boy's view. Shopping in Great Haywood.Tourism and a Traffic Survey.
